item.title: What Is Above The Fold Content? | Build Hello | We design, code, and fix websites
item.description: (function() {var scrollyt=window.requestAnimationFrame||function(callback){window.setTimeout(callback,1000/60)};var elementsToShowy=document.querySelectorAll('#a9hj0Hel4Nhc');function isElementInViewporty(el){if(typeof jQuery==="function"&&el instanceof jQuery){el=el[0]}var rect=el.getBoundingClientRect();return((rect.top=0)||(rect.bottom=(window.innerHeight||document.documentElement.clientHeight)&&rect.top=0&&rect.bottom Above The Fold When you first navigate to a website the content you see on the screen is called above the fold content. On any device, loading above the fold content first, and the rest of the content later, will speed up the rendering of the website by the browser.

item.title: What is Lighthouse? | Build Hello | We design, code, and fix websites, and we do it in a way that lowers your five-year developer cost.
item.description: (function() {var scrollyt=window.requestAnimationFrame||function(callback){window.setTimeout(callback,1000/60)};var elementsToShowy=document.querySelectorAll('#a_GbkWQ-nup0');function isElementInViewporty(el){if(typeof jQuery==="function"&&el instanceof jQuery){el=el[0]}var rect=el.getBoundingClientRect();return((rect.top=0)||(rect.bottom=(window.innerHeight||document.documentElement.clientHeight)&&rect.top=0&&rect.bottom What is Lighthouse? Chrome browser comes with a website audit tool included. You can use it to audit your website. You can read more about lighthouse here. Why Should I Audit My Website? Auditing your website will let you know what Chrome thinks about it in terms of "
